subject: Re: Mailing List
preview: Hi Rheiven, We have implemented the shorter form. Regarding the job order, yes this will come with the invoice at the end of the month.

full_threads.body:
Hi Rheiven, 

We have implemented the shorter form. 

Regarding the job order, yes this will come with the invoice at the end of the month.

Hi Heath,

As discussed please find new links below:

URL - http://mgl.io/50RUb
iFrame - <iframe src="https://myguestlist.com.au/mgl/showForm.php?id=5c982ce4146fb" width="100%" frameBorder="0" scrolling="auto" style="border:none" border="0" height="600"></iframe>

Can you also send a work report which states the job order together with the cost for the excess 30 minutes for this month? ( Alex is just asking for reference)

Would be helpful, if you can advise how much are we charged per hour/mins for overtime so I can keep this in mind for future website work planning.

Thank you



Warm Regards,


RHEIVEN BAUTISTA

EVENTS AND MARKETING

Lot 2-4 / 330 Church Street

Parramatta NSW 2150

E: rheiven@alexandco.com.au

P: +61 2 9194 4499

INSTAGRAM FACEBOOK WEBSITE

This email, including any attachments, are strictly confidential and may be legally privileged or copyright material. If you are not the intended recipient please notify the sender immediately by return email, and please delete both emails. You should not read, copy, or use this email (including any attachments) for any purpose or disclose its contents to any other person. ALEX&Co. and its affiliates reserve the right to monitor all email communications through their networks.

Hi Rheiven, 

We have now implemented the pop-up (from the right of the browser on desktop) and a link/button in the footer of the site on mobile.

We tried the popup on mobile, but it filled up almost the whole screen, so was not ideal. I think this is the best solution for both desktop and mobile. 

Regarding the actual sign up form. Are you able to remove the logo from in and decrease some of the space etc in between the fields... it's just quite tall at the moment. Let me know?

Hi Heath,

We decided to go for option 2, assuming all future subscription will go automatically to Myguest directly?

Please advise when will this be available.

Thanks and have a lovely weekend!



Warm Regards,


RHEIVEN BAUTISTA

EVENTS AND MARKETING

Lot 2-4 / 330 Church Street

Parramatta NSW 2150

E: rheiven@alexandco.com.au

P: +61 2 9194 4499

INSTAGRAM FACEBOOK WEBSITE

This email, including any attachments, are strictly confidential and may be legally privileged or copyright material. If you are not the intended recipient please notify the sender immediately by return email, and please delete both emails. You should not read, copy, or use this email (including any attachments) for any purpose or disclose its contents to any other person. ALEX&Co. and its affiliates reserve the right to monitor all email communications through their networks.

Hi Rheiven and Alex, 

We have reviewed the form, you have 2 options. 

Option 1 - We add a SUBSCRIBE button and when you click it the form will open in a new tab/screen, and look like this https://myguestlist.com.au/mgl/showForm.php?id=595eeadf064ac - 15 min task

Option 2 - We add it as a pop-up of sorts that slides in from the bottom right of the screen and displays the form there. It can appear on every page and if the user dismisses it, the form won't show up again until the following day. (Like the valentines and Arabic night popup rule.)

Option 2 is a more tidy solution in my opinion and should increase your subscribe rates, please let me know? Which way you would like to head?

Thanks guys,
Also please make sure that we won't pay you extra for the hours unless it's approved in writing.


Yours faithfully,

Alex Aslan
M: +61 401 690 401

Thanks  Rheiven,

We will implement this and let you know if we have any questions or roadblocks.

Good Morning Heath,

Please find link of the code below:

URL - http://mgl.io/501pF

iFrame/ Embedded Form - <iframe src="https://myguestlist.com.au/mgl/showForm.php?id=595eeadf064ac" width="100%" frameBorder="0" scrolling="auto" style="border:none" border="0" height="600"></iframe>

Let me know if this is okay.

Warm Regards,

RHEIVEN BAUTISTA
EVENTS AND MARKETING
Lot 2-4 / 330 Church Street
Parramatta NSW 2150
E: rheiven@alexandco.com.au
P: +61 2 9194 4499

> Hi Alex and Rheiven,
>
> Ok it looks like you can create a form in MyGuestList that we could then embed on your website : )
>
> Here is a link: http://support.myguestlist.com.au/kb/article/30-create-website-forms/
>
> Did you want to create the form and send us the embed code? Or you can send us your logins and we will see if we can do it from our end.
>
> Thanks,
> Heath Maguire
> Director

>>> On Mon, Mar 18, 2019 at 6:31 PM Heath Maguire <heath@wpperk.com> wrote:
>>> Hi Rheiven,
>>>
>>> We can do this, however, perhaps we can have the submissions go directly into your email database/software.
>>>
>>> Are you using something like MailChimp? If so let me know which software you are using and we can see if it can be integrated into your site.
>>>
>>> Also, with regards to collecting peoples Date of Birth and mobile number, you are going to have to put some compelling information for them to enter this info. People are becoming more conscious of entering their info online for things like this so your compelling offer needs to address the risk versus reward conundrum.
>>>
>>> For example, you would need to have something like enter your details to receive a free meal on your birthday (or something to that affect).
>>>
>>> I hope that makes sense and let me know which system you are using. Thanks,
>>>
>>> Heath Maguire
>>> Director
>>>
>>> E. heath@wpperk.com | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271
>>>
>>>
>>>
>>>
